snippet.title: Icaria - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Please Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2613890/Icaria/?utm_source=ytrev

Automate a team of robots to gather resources, scale up production, reshape terrain, and expand your colony on a procedurally generated alien world.

Recorded in one take from the game into OBS. All movement, actions and the camera are automated with in game systems normally used for playing the game. Captured in real time on an AMD Ryzen 7 5800X with an Nvidia 2060 Super Graphics card.

Join our Discord to follow along with development  https://discord.gg/8PEdwzV
